multimeter package¶

Submodules¶

multimeter.Agilent34410A_server module¶

Provides access to Agilent 34410A multimeters.

class multimeter.Agilent34410A_server.ag34410aServer¶

Bases: labrad.server.LabradServer

Provides access to Agilent 34410A multimeters.

get_devices(**kwargs)¶

Lists connected multimeters. Note that the function connects to each device to check its ID.

Parameters:c – A LabRAD context (which is passed on to passed to ag34410aServer.select_device())
Yields:A list of strings corresponding to the IDs of connected multimeters
initServer(**kwargs)¶

Lists connected multimeters, if any, and connects to the first one.

log_multimeter(**kwargs)¶

Logs the current multimeter data

name = '%LABRADNODE%_ag34410a'¶
read(**kwargs)¶

Reads the current data from the multimeter

Parameters:c – A LabRAD context (not used)
Yields:[type] – [description]
select_device(c, device)¶

Select a connected multimeter

Parameters:
  • c – A LabRAD context (not used)
  • device (string) – The ID of the multimeter to connect to, as returned by ag34410aServer.get_devices()
